function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Insufficient ventilation in makeshift hospitals may increase infection risk of opportunistic airborne transmission.","Impact":"Higher likelihood of opportunistic airborne transmission of contagious diseases, leading to increased infections among patients and medical staff.","Mitigation":"Increase ventilation rates to the maximum supported by the system, use air purifiers to reduce virus-laden aerosols.","Technologies":"Ventilation system modification, air purifiers.","People":"Patients, medical staff.","Owner":"Facility management, hospital administrators."},{"Description":"Inadequate pressure regime in ventilation systems may lead to contaminated air escaping from isolation rooms.","Impact":"Contaminated air escaping from isolation rooms, increasing the risk of spreading contagious diseases to other areas of the building.","Mitigation":"Implement a pressure regime to push air from clean areas to dirty areas and out of the building, create negative pressure rooms.","Technologies":"Pressure monitoring and control systems, negative pressure room design.","People":"Patients, medical staff.","Owner":"Facility management, hospital administrators."}]}
